content:
Hi!

I was double checking my work on PSET 1 in the test file, when I realized that it marked one of the answers in part c as incorrect because the steps were 11 instead of 12. Is this something I should try to change, or would this be an acceptable step number? The other test cases were accepted.
Also, in the same problem, (part c), I turned the ‘amount saved’ into a function. Should this be listed under the constants heading in the document or where I completed the steps to reach the r value? (Currently I have it as a constant, since the function itself is referred to.)

Thanks!

-Vera
subject: PSET 1 clarification on acceptable values

content:
Hi Vera,

The online tester allows steps to be off by a maximum of 3, so your answer will be fine.
